diff_analysis.evidence: The NEW code removes path resolution and parent-directory checks in dump_content and get_mediastatic_content. dump_content now writes to Path(destination) / path.lstrip('/') without verifying it stays within the destination directory, and get_mediastatic_content no longer resolves the path or checks it is under MEDIA_ROOT/STATIC_ROOT. This allows crafted paths to escape the intended directories, introducing a path traversal vulnerability.
